com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.jdbc

Class FlexibleTagTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.jdbc.FlexibleTagTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFromMessageTransformer, IMessageTransformer, IToMessageTransformer

    public class FlexibleTagTransformer
extends Object
implements IMessageTransformer
    A transformer class to construct FIX messages out of database fields and vice-versa using the tags specified by the user.

    This class is designed to be used with DefaultJdbcApplicationReader which defines house-keeping columns which are ignored by toMessage(java.lang.Object, com.camerontec.catalys.core.message.IFIXMessage, boolean).

    Author:
    George Vassilopoulos, Maria Ischuk adapted to new IFIXMessage/IMessageTransformer and unit test FlexibleTagTransformerTestCase

      • toMessage

        public IFIXMessage toMessage(Object resultSet,
                             IFIXMessage target,
                             boolean dialectAllowNoLengthOnRawData)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException,
                             UnsupportedOperationException,
                             NullPointerException
        Transforms a database ResultSet to a FIX message using the dbToFixTags as a DB scheme.

        If repeating group should be created the dbToFixTags should provides a strict order of repeating group as per FIX protocol with NumInGroup tag in the beginning.

        The ResultSet is a tuple of values to be set to a corresponding fix tag tuple provided by the user.

        Specified by:
        toMessage in interface IToMessageTransformer
        Parameters:
        resultSet - The ResultSet object used to populate the message
        target - The message into which the object is to be transformed. Cannot be null.
        dialectAllowNoLengthOnRawData - ignored
        Returns:
        A fix message
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if it was not possible to derive a message from the given resultSet
        UnsupportedOperationException - on SQL errors or if this type of transformation isn't supported by this transformer
        NullPointerException - if target is null

      • toMessage

        public IFIXMessage toMessage(Object source,
                             IFIXMessage target)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException,
                             UnsupportedOperationException,
                             NullPointerException
        Convenience for toMessage(source, target, false)
        Specified by:
        toMessage in interface IToMessageTransformer
        Parameters:
        source - Object from which message is derived.
        target - The message into which the object is to be transformed. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        IFIXMessage target message (transformed from source)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If it was not possible to derive a message from the given object.
        UnsupportedOperationException - If this form of transformation is not supported by this transformer.
        NullPointerException - if target was null and is needed by a particular implementation of this interface method

      • toObject

        public Object toObject(IFIXMessage source,
                       Object target)
                throws IllegalArgumentException,
                       UnsupportedOperationException,
                       CryptoException
        Transforms a FIX message to a List containing FieldValueInfo objects using the FixToDbTags or fieldDataSet as a DB scheme. If data type information is provided conversion is attempted. If conversion is unsuccessful, value is returned as a string anyway. If null values are specified as not permitted an exception is thrown in case of a null.

        If repeating group should be created the FixToDbTags or fieldDataSet should provides a maximum number of possible occurrence. In the returned list they will be sorted not per FIX order but by FIX tag.

        Specified by:
        toObject in interface IFromMessageTransformer
        Parameters:
        source - Message to be transformed into an object.
        target - Not used.
        Returns:
        A List containing FieldValueInfo objects
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If it was not possible to convert the message.
        UnsupportedOperationException - if this form of transformation is not supported by this transformer.
        CryptoException - If the transformation failed due to an encryption problem

      • extractJdbcValue

        public List<?> extractJdbcValue(IFieldData fieldData,
                                IFIXMessage source,
                                String dataType)
        Returns list of JDBC values in specified type
        Parameters:
        fieldData - IFieldData describing DB column in which this FIX values will be put
        source - FIX message from which information will be fetched
        dataType - SQL data type
        Returns:
        List of JDBC values in which the FIX values will be transformed

                    OutputStream target)
             throws IllegalArgumentException,
                    UnsupportedOperationException,

        Description copied from interface: IFromMessageTransformer
        Transform the given message into bytes, written to the given output stream.
        Specified by:
        toStream in interface IFromMessageTransformer
        Parameters:
        source - Message to be transformed onto a stream.
        target - Output stream where message is written.
        Returns:
